Name: Golden Ivy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac stirred with rich berry flavours of muscat wine along with the relatively dry berry flavour of cranberry.
History: A Christmas cocktail created in October 2011 by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Ivy contains 170 calories
